alert.note: Alert for Perry (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 15 at 5:41PM CDT until May 15 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Missouri, including the following county, Perry. * WHEN...Until 715 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 534 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated that, due to thunderstorms, over 2 inches of rain occurred across parts of the advisory area in a short time. Minor flooding is ongoing in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Perryville and Lithium. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
